puzzle.title: Calendar
puzzle.hint: Emma, Steven, and Gabe all use analog clocks.
Emma, Steven, and Gabe all have the same novelty clocks with flags on the minute and hour hands.
Emma's first event is at 4:00, which is the letter "V" in semaphore. Thus, the first letter of one of the words is V.
The solution is VINCENTE'S ON HAWTHORNE
